Comment: Hallo! Ich heisse Anna, und ich komme aus Deutschland. Ich studiere Literatur, und ich finde Uebersetzung sehr wichtig, weil viele Laender besser miteinander kommunizieren koe̦nnen, wenn sie die Sprache der andere Laender lesen koe̦nnen. Aber viele Leute kann nur ein oder zwei Sprachen sprechen/lesen, und deshalb sind Uebersetzer sehr wichtig. Wir brauchen immer Leute, die andere Sprachen koe̦nnen, damit wir alle miteinander sprechen koe̦nnen. Ich bin so froh, dass Burlington Translate Uebersetzungen macht, und wir koe̦nnen fuer spezifische Texten erbitten. Sie sind sehr gut, die Uebersetzungen sind realistisch, genau und verstaendlich, und ich werde sie anderen Leuten empfehlen. Vielen Dank fuer diese Webseite, sie ist sehr schoe̦n.
Comment Translation: Translation: Hi! My name is Anna, and I a۪m from Germany. I study literature, and I think translation is very important. Countries can communicate with each other better when they can understand the languages of other countries. But a lot of people can only speak/read one or two languages, and therefore translators are very important. We always need more people that can speak other languages, so that we can all speak with each other. I a۪m very happy that Translation Burlington makes translations, and we can request specific texts to be translated. They a۪re really good, the translations are very realistic, exact, and understandable, and I will definitely recommend them to other people. Thank you so much for making this website, it i۪s amazing!

Comment: Ciao! Mi chiamo Maria, e studio la linguistica. Amo la traduzione perche mi piace leggere i libri di molte lingue ma non posso leggere tutte le lingue. Percio e la traduzione necessaria. Questo sito web e benissimo! Grazie per le traduzioni.
Comment Translation: Translation: Hi! I am Maria, and I study linguistics. I love translation because I like reading books from many languages, but I cannot read every language. Therefore translation is necessary. This website is wonderful! Thank you for the translations!

Comment: !Me encanta este sitio web! Soy estudiante en la universidad, y hago mucho investigacion. A veces tengo fuentes muy larga y complicada en ingles que no puedo entender pero son importantes en mi trabajo. Por eso este sitio web es muy util para mi. Puedo traducir las fuentes a espanol y no necesito preocuparme sobre la precision de la traduccion. !Muchisimas gracias!
Comment Translation: Translation: I love this website! I am a student at university, and I do a lot of research. Sometimes I have very long and complicated sources in English that I cannot understand but are important in my work. Thus, this website is very useful for me. I can translate sources to Spanish and I do not have to worry about the accuracy of the translation. Thank you so much!

Comment: Hallo, ich heisse Marie, und ich liebe diese Webseite. Sehr schoen!

Comment Translation: Translation: Hello, my name is Anthony, and I am a student at the University of Florence. I study a lot, and sometimes I have to read books in English, but I do not like reading books in English. This website can translate the book for me! Thank you so much!
